query.name: Tissue_Flyatlas
query.view: FlyAtlasResult.mRNASignal FlyAtlasResult.mRNASignalSEM FlyAtlasResult.presentCall FlyAtlasResult.enrichment FlyAtlasResult.affyCall FlyAtlasResult.genes.secondaryIdentifier FlyAtlasResult.genes.symbol FlyAtlasResult.material.primaryIdentifier FlyAtlasResult.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Show gene expression in the following tissue from D. melanogaster and the Affymetrix probes that were used to obtain these data.(Data Source: FlyAtlas).
query.constraintLogic: C and B and D and E and A

constraint.description: that were detectably expressed in the following number of arrays (out of 4):
